page.title: 18The Rector of Wool
page.content: No two days in the life of a Vicar are the same, so the day I describe happened only once. Ascension Day started in sunshine; I unlocked the church, said the morning prayer, and came down to school; three hymns at assembly and everyone awake, but some couldn't count! Back to church, singing to myself on the way, for Communion, and the baptism of a grownup. She was nervous, but had many friends in support. After which,away to Weymouth for a cremation - a cloud came over, and went; home for lunch, which my wife always has ready - I washed up ,dried and had a quick cuppa, then out on my visits. Many like to come to church on Ascension Day, so back again to church. Hurrah!No meeting tonight.
